articles.author: DeFi Pulse 🍇
articles.description:
DeFi Pulse unpacked the recent crypto regulatory events in our latest episode of Money Legos w/ Blockchain Law Professor @JWVerret. 
We covered: 
🌪️ @TornadoCash sanctions
💥 Ookie DAO CFTC lawsuit
💰 Draft Stablecoin Bill
+ more!
Watch the full episode: https://youtu.be/gkYXKUvvaNo

See a protocol's user base w/ Growth Internals, DeFi Pulse's new dataset.

articles.author: DeFi Pulse 🍇
articles.description:
Re Beyond seeing a list of all the tokens, you can use the token filter to chart the TVL for a single token.
Go to a project's TVL, click the gear icon, and select a token to view the individual token's TVL, Quantity Locked, & Value Share.

articles.description:
Re Seeing what tokens make up a protocol's TVL and how these change over time can help you gauge a project's ability to attract & retain high-caliber assets.
Using the Token TVL Share chart, you can see the top tokens making up a protocol's TVL and the changes over time.

articles.author: DeFi Pulse 🍇
articles.description:
⚡Are you ready to see more granular TVL information for a protocol?
We have updated our platform to show protocol token-level TVL data in 3 new features:
1. Token TVL share over time
2. Current token TVL
3. Individual token filter
Let's take a look 👇
